dossier14_appartement.title: Apartment 14
dossier14_appartement.desc: At 2:14 a.m., someone says your name in the hallway. By following a door that should not exist, you descend into a building that already seems to know you.

bunker_reserve.title: Bunker
bunker_reserve.desc: Beneath an ordinary hill, a hatch hides a bunker that is still active. Untouched supplies, badges, dorm rooms, and sealed areas make it clear that someone is still living down there.

hopital_ferme.title: Abandoned Hospital
hopital_ferme.desc: Inside a hospital closed for years, your name already appears in the records. Between a patient badge, Room 14, and rooms still lit, everything suggests your arrival was expected.

metro_station_zero.title: Station Zero
metro_station_zero.desc: You descend into a station that appears on no map. Frozen platforms, strange announcements, a Zero ticket, and shifting corridors lead you toward a place that seems to be waiting for you.

styx_gare.title: Styx Station
styx_gare.desc: You wake up alone in a station drowned in black fog. Between dead clocks, endless platforms, and a black ticket, everything feels like you have arrived in a place that judges its travelers.

foret_relais.title: Whispering Forest
foret_relais.desc: Deep in the forest, signs bear your first name and the paths keep changing places. The farther you go, the more the old relay post seems to be calling you.

chateau_absents.title: Castle of Shadows
chateau_absents.desc: An isolated castle opens its gates to you, then shifts its hallways around you. Between portraits, empty rooms, and hidden passages, the place keeps the trace of those who enter.

temple_mictlan.title: Temple Mictlan
temple_mictlan.desc: Fresh out of college, you travel to Mexico to study a newly discovered area. Beneath the stone, you uncover the buried temple of the Lady of the Dead.
